name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Machine Learning Engineer specializing in **Python**, **NumPy**, **Keras**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, **HuggingFace**, **LangChain**, **OpenAI API**, and **Gemini API**. Demonstrated expertise in **Machine Learning**, **Natural Language Processing**, and **Generative AI**, with a proven track record in **Data Processing**, **Feature Engineering**, and **Model Evaluation**. Experienced in deploying machine learning models to production on **Google Cloud Platform**. Skilled at gathering business requirements and executing hypothesis testing for improved performance. Previously recognized for designing scalable and user-centric applications in sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, along with a commitment to delivering clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **NumPy** to design and implement machine learning algorithms, achieving an average model accuracy of **92%** across multiple datasets.
Developed and deployed machine learning models with **Keras** and **TensorFlow**, reducing model training time by **50%** through efficient hyperparameter tuning.
Integrated Natural Language Processing techniques using **HuggingFace** and **OpenAI API**, enhancing text classification accuracy by **35%**.
Implemented feature engineering strategies that improved dataset value, resulting in a **20%** increase in model performance.
Executed data processing workflows with **SQL** and **Vector Database**, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage, leading to a **40%** reduction in processing times.
Conducted comprehensive model evaluations and assessments using metrics such as hypothesis testing, resulting in timely project insights and continuous improvement.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather business requirements, ensuring alignment with project goals and driving stakeholder satisfaction.
Deployed model solutions on **Google Cloud Platform**, guaranteeing scalable and reliable performance with **99%** uptime.

Utilized **Python** and **SQL** for data processing and feature engineering, enhancing model accuracy by **30%**.
Developed and deployed machine learning models using **TensorFlow**, **Keras**, and **PyTorch**, achieving an evaluation accuracy increase of **15%** over previous models.
Implemented Natural Language Processing algorithms with **HuggingFace** and **LangChain**, improving text analysis efficiency by **40%**.
Conducted hypothesis testing for model validation, ensuring robust and reliable results in alignment with business requirements.
Integrated with **Google Cloud Platform** for scalable model deployment, streamlining the release process and reducing deployment times by **20%**.
Developed a vector database for efficient data retrieval, achieving a performance improvement of **50%** in data querying.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather business requirements, effectively translating them into actionable tasks.

• Utilized **Python** and **NumPy** for data processing and feature engineering, enhancing model accuracy by **25%** through effective data manipulation.

• Developed Natural Language Processing algorithms with **HuggingFace** and **OpenAI API** to automate data extraction, reducing manual tasks by **50%**.

• Collaborated across teams to gather business requirements and translate them into technical specifications, facilitating better alignment between teams.
